sql.statement: CREATE TABLE promo_online_config(param_name TEXT, param_value TEXT, param_format TEXT, CONSTRAINT PK_promo_online_config PRIMARY KEY (param_name));
CREATE TABLE promo_conf_activitity(id TEXT,name TEXT,label_en TEXT,label_es TEXT,url TEXT,effective_date DATETIME,expire_date DATETIME,active NUMERIC);
UPDATE conf_general SET param_value = '20', update_time = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE param_name = 'DB_VERSION';
